aXe Playground

Choose a Preset Fixture

Start by choosing a preset fixture. Choose the 'Type' and 'Name' of a specific rule or check you like to test.

Type
Name

Edit the Fixture

You can edit the markup of the fixture below. This can be useful to test whether minor adjustments to the given markup will satisfy the aXe tool's rules.

View the Rendered Fixture

Everything in the area below will be targeted by aXe when you analyze the page.

Modify the aXe Options

Modify the options object below and click 'Analyze' to update the results. For more info, see the aXe documentation for the Options parameter.

View the aXe Results
